svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #006EAF); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
